h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Making your way up the long stairs to the second level, be ready for a Yaksha Archer to take potshots at you from above, and deflect them with some staff-spinning.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
Making your way up the long stairs to the second level, be ready for a Yaksha Archer to take potshots at you from above, and deflect them with some staff-spinning.
